description: The seasonal whale watch (Dec 15th - March 30th) snorkel cruise is an ideal excursion, combining three favorite ocean adventures in Maui. Enjoy a scenic cruise, epic whale watching, and delightful snorkeling all in one afternoon! We provide everything make sure you have an amazing experience. * GUARANTEED humpback whale sightings * Hydrophone to hear the whales * Refreshments upon boarding * Delicious BBQ lunch * Premium open bar * All gear and instruction provided * The MOST amenities of any snorkel boat on Maui
